name: Finneas
text: Hello? Are you okay?? Why are you restrained?
Please.. please help me.. they.. I don't know what they've done to me.. please

name: Jamie
text: My name is Jamie... Jamie Howl.. Ever since I was admitted to this hospital.. my mind hasn't been working right. They won't tell me what's wrong with me either.. Please I need you to set me free...

name: Finneas
text: (He doesn't seem to be in his right mind.. And he looks.. off.)

options.text: Ignore him and keep searching for Penelope's room.

name: Finneas
text: I'm sorry.. I have to find my sister. I promise to come back later.

name: Finneas
text: OW! What is wrong with you?!
